General.Name: Mobeus Income And Growth Vct Plc
General.Description: Mobeus Income & Growth VCT Plc is a venture capital trust which specializes in investments in mature stage investments in unquoted companies. However, it can co-invest in larger mature unquoted companies. The fund seeks to invest in companies based in the United Kingdom. It initially invests from £0.02 million ($0.03 million) to £1 million ($1.56 million) in its portfolio companies. The fund structures its investments as part equity and part loan. It invests in companies having not more than £15 million ($23.33 million) of gross assets at the time of investment.
